about_the_game:
The Holobunnies: Pause Cafe soundtrack was composed and recorded by q-bit Games, in collaboration with deadly surprise. It is available in high quality MP3 format.

Track List:

  • You Like Jazz?
  • Café Theme (Jazzy Break 2017)
  • Select Your Character
  • Darkest Legends
  • Prince From Heaven
  • Brown Ground
  • Dreams Come True Everyday (SM)
  • Kevin's Erotic Voyage Into Nebulas (K.E.V.I.N.)
  • Bongs Osmoses (deadly surprise cover)

Bonus Tracks:

  • It's been three years. (English Pause Café Live Reveal)
  • Ça fait trois ans. (French Pause Café Live Reveal)
  • Sick Ducks

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Core2Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum screen resolution of 1280x720

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX Mountain Lion (10.8)
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Core2Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 1.4 or better
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum screen resolution of 1280x720
